participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and caring, loves to help others and is always eager to learn new things.
participant_1.background: I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park. I'm interested in trying new things and expanding my horizons. My favorite band is the Avert Brothers. I am 6 foot tall. I am still a student, but I am gonna be a nurse.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Passionate and engaging, enjoys sharing knowledge and connecting with others, especially children.
participant_2.background: I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world. I love to ski in the winter. I want a home with a secure bike parking space and a place to plug in my tablet. I sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs. I teach 5th grade students near Oakville, NY.

content.text: Hello!
Hi! How are you?
I'm doing well! I'm a student and I'm studying to be a nurse.
That's great! I'm a 5th grade teacher!
That's awesome! What's your favorite part of being a teacher?
I love seeing the excitement on my students' faces when they learn something new.
That's so great! I love working with people, so I think I'll like being a nurse.
I'm sure you will! I love seeing the difference I can make in my students' lives.
That's so great! I'm really excited to start my career.
I'm sure you'll do great! What's your favorite kind of music?
I love the Avert Brothers! They're so upbeat and fun.
I've never heard of them! I'll have to check them out.
They're great! You can listen to them on Spotify.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
No problem! What's your favorite book?
I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world. I just finished reading The Great Gatsby.
I've heard that's a great book! I've never read it, but I've heard good things.
It's really good! You should check it out.
I will! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Good! I'm sure you'll like it.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
